DOC.brief_summary: This prospective study patient diagnose chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) respiratory failure admit West China Hospital April 2017 March 2019 . The following variable prospectively study : age , sex , height , weight , respiratory function indicator , arterial blood gas analysis result , biochemical data , nutritional risk screening 2002 ( NRS 2002 ) score , short-term long-term prognostic outcome . The purpose study ass whether NRS 2002 useful prognosis predictor COPD patient respiratory failure .
DOC.brief_title: NRS 2002 Predictor Prognosis COPD With Respiratory Failure
